header_text: You doctor encouraged you to try some new hobbies, so today you are attending a crafting workshop. You begin to have trouble handling the tools due to the chorea. You ask for assistance from the instructor and the craft is completed.

elements.Text: Are you able to finish the craft?

elements.name: You doctor encouraged you to try some new hobbies, so today you are attending a crafting workshop. You begin to have trouble handling the tools due to the chorea. You ask for assistance from the instructor and the craft is completed. _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
